title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Short introduction -Discrete time systems and signals; Z-transform, Difference equation. Filter design by transformation - Impulse and step Invariant, Bi-linear Ztransform, matched Z-transform. Signal Model-AR, MA, ARMA, State Variable model, Lattice structures. FIR filter design, Frequency windowing technique, Equi ripple Chebyshev and Butterworth criterion. Filter performance and design in presence of noise, FIR filters banks-subband decomposition. Inverse filtering-Deconvolution and equalization techniques-Weiner, Linear prediction etc., Signal reconstruction. Time frequency Analysis - STFT, WT, DSP hardware - Design methodologies, Popular architectures and overview of programming Application notes. Filter implementation: Topology, Scaling, Coefficient quantization, Signal quantization, Sensitivity analysis.
